about_the_game:
Discover the dark secrets of Yalroc Island

You're a young, inexperienced recruit to the Canihuel Empire.

Why has the power-hungry Empress Keranna sent you on a mission to the seemingly peaceful Yalroc Island?

Is it because of rumors of the presence of a legendary military artifact of devastating power, or does the Empire have other plans for you?

Explore, solve, fight

Antediluvial: Yalroc Island is a game inspired by the classic ARPGs of the 90s. Explore gloomy dungeons and solve puzzles, fight a variety of enemies, demonstrate your skills in platforming phases and explore the island to discover its secrets.

A game based on a time loop: three days to survive the flood

In Antediluvial: Yalroc Island, each cycle begins with the same initial state, but depending on your actions and discoveries, it will be different from the previous one.

If things go wrong, you can always restart a cycle at any time. You'll keep the equipment, island knowledge and items you've accumulated over the course of your adventures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7800 Series - 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Freshly enrolled in the Empress's personal guard, you are assigned to investigate an island cut off from the world and whose inhabitants refuse to submit to the authority of the empire. Discover the secrets of the island, doomed to disappear in a ruthless flood. You have 3 days to change everything.
